Name: Toko Surima
Review Text: It doesn't matter what you try. It is all delicious and halal. Can eat this each and every time.

Name: Toko Surima
Review Text: Me and my partner went here to grab a quick cheap bite, the food looked like it was ready for the waste bin we aren’t sure if it was gone off or not. We got told a meal would be around €6-€8 euros so we had a small meal each which was …

Name: Toko Surima
Review Text: Wow. Terrific Surinamese food.  Such friendly people.  Small and casual inside.  Great for a quick bite or a big meal.

Name: Toko Surima
Review Text: They prepare big plates with meat, rice and vegetables. Good if you want to eat.

Name: Toko Surima
Review Text: Really good food for a fair price and friendly staff.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Do you absolutely no longer want to get food here, dear people? That woman coughs in all that food in the morning and does not put her hand over her mouth and the food is dirty and old and you really do not get fresh …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Not to eat. Vegetables are not fresh, meat is completely covered with herbs so that you don't taste real taste and the staff is amateurish. In the past it was no longer possible. You pay 20 euros for a full stomach …
